meanings.definition: In an absentminded manner; without full attention or focus.
meanings.sent1: She walked absentmindedly down the street, lost in her thoughts.
meanings.sent2: He often forgets his keys because he moves absentmindedly around the house.
meanings.sent3: While cooking dinner, she absentmindedly put salt instead of sugar in the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: The artist absentmindedly painted swirls of color on the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The student stared out the window absentmindedly, missing the teacher's instructions.
